org.jetel.data.formatter

Class TextTableFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.formatter.AbstractFormatter
      • org.jetel.data.formatter.TextTableFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Formatter

    public class TextTableFormatter
extends AbstractFormatter
    Outputs data record in form coherent with given mask. Handles encoding of characters. Uses WriteableChannel.
    Since:
    Oct 27, 2006

      • finish

        public void finish()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Formatter
        This method writes all data (header, body, footer) which are to write, but doesn't close underlying streams. TODO remove this method, Formatter.flush() is good enough, see CL-2196
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • write

        public int write(DataRecord record)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes record as 'write' function, but likewise can better format the rows. For MAX_COUNT_ANALYZED_COUNT rows return 0. Then returns count of all written rows.
        Parameters:
        record -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
